name: src/parser.js
Parser
description: The Parser class.

params.name: rules
params.description: an object containing rules

params.name: defaultRule
params.description: the default rule to use when parsing

name: rules
description: the rules map

name: defaultRule
description: the default rule's name to use

name: getRule
description: find rule by name

params.name: name
params.description: the rule's name

name: parse
description: Parse provided string with specific rule

params.name: string
params.description: the string to parse

params.name: rule
params.description: the name of the rule to apply. default is null (will use parser's default method if not provided).

params.name: descriptor
params.description: the main descriptor object

params.name: env
params.description: the env object (internal object used while parsing)

name: exec
description: Execute a rule (only for those who developing grammars)

params.name: rule
params.description: the name of the rule to use or the rule itself

params.name: descriptor
params.description: the descriptor to decorate

params.name: env
params.description: the inner-job main object where parser, parsed string and eventual errors are stored

throws.description: If rule is string (so it's a rule's name) and referenced rule could not be found with it.

name: src/rule.js
Rule
description: The Rule base class.

name: constructor
description: the Rule constructor

name: done
description: the base handler for every other lexems

params.name: callback
params.description: the callback to handle string

name: use
description: use another rule

params.name: rule
params.description: the rule to use

name: terminal
description: catch a terminal

params.name: reg
params.description: the terminal's regexp

params.name: set
params.description:
either the name of the property (in current descriptor) where store the catched value 
                          or a function to handle captured object by hand

name: char
description: match a single character

params.name: test
params.description: the caracter to match

name: xOrMore
description: match x or more element from string with provided rule

params.name: rule
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: zeroOrMore
description: match 0 or more element from string with provided rule

params.name: rule
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: oneOrMore
description: match 1 or more element from string with provided rule

params.name: rule
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: oneOf
description: match one element from string with one of provided rules

params.name: rules
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: maybeOneOf
description: maybe match one element from string with one of provided rules

params.name: rules
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: one
description: match one element from string with provided rule

params.name: rule
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: maybeOne
description: maybe match one element from string with provided rule

params.name: rule
params.description: either a rule instance or an option object

name: skip
description: skip current descriptor

name: space
description: match a space (any spaces, or carriage returns, or new lines)

params.name: needed
params.description: true if space is needed. false otherwise.

name: end
description: match the end of string

name: error
description: force end parsing with error. Only aimed to be used in .oneOf().

params.name: msg
params.description: the error message.
